title: Pixel 2 and 4G on Sky
content:
I'm unable to connect to a 4G Network when using my Pixel 2 phone using Sky UK.
When I have used an EE SIM in my Pixel I was able to receive a good 4G Signal, but since switching to Sky mobile I'm only able to receive an LTE connection.

Is this a know issue as I've read other posts that have had similar experiences.
